South_Bend.Bethel College (Indiana):
Bethel College, a Christian liberal arts college located in Mishawaka, Indiana, United States, was established in 1947 and is affiliated with the evangelical Christian Missionary Church.


== Organization and administration ==
Bethel is a part of the Council for Christian Colleges and Universities and the Council of Independent Colleges. Bethel is regionally accredited by The Higher Learning Commission of the North Central Association of Colleges and Schools.
